article_title: Girl's slaying a big case for small Temple Terrace department
article_text: Family attorney Ariel O. Garcia, Felecia Demerson, the mother of Felecia Williams, and Temple Terrace Police Chief Ken Albano announced the arrest of Granville Ashanti Ritchie, a suspect in the murder of Felecia Williams, in May. FILE, ANDY JONES/STAFF

article_metadata.Description: Besides Felecia Williams' case, Temple Terrace police have only had 10 other murders since 2000. Three of those, including the two most high-profile, are unsolved and considered cold cases.

og.description: Besides Felecia Williams' case, Temple Terrace police have only had 10 other murders since 2000. Three of those, including the two most high-profile, are unsolved and considered cold cases.

article_summary:
Family attorney Ariel O. Garcia, Felecia Demerson, the mother of Felecia Williams, and Temple Terrace Police Chief Ken Albano announced the arrest of Granville Ashanti Ritchie, a suspect in the murder of Felecia Williams, in May.
FILE, ANDY JONES/STAFF
